summary: This document is a set of 30-minute check sheets for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 9, 2019. The sheets are for multiple tiers (L-Tier, NI-Tier, LA Tier, ZA Tier-K, ZA Tier-G, ZA Tier-H, ZB) and document staff observations of inmates in locked-down status, as required by procedure. The sheets are reviewed by a Lieutenant and Captain.
